name: BLACKOUT (itch) (Pothencial)
description:
BLACKOUT is a short horror game in which you explore a mysterious environment, hoping to escape.

Sneak past mysterious creatures in an absurd unpredictable environment and find out why and how you got there.

This game is an entry to the Brackey's Game Jam 2022.8 - theme You're not alone

Volume & Bright flashing lights warning

CONTROLS
W A S D - Movement
Mouse - Camera movement
Q E - Lean Left / Right
F - Interact
ESC - Press 4 times to quit to menu
